alert.note: Alert for Benton; Carroll; Madison (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 8:36AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Benton, northern Madison and Carroll Counties through 930 AM CDT... At 835 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 2 miles northwest of Pea Ridge to 2 miles southeast of Elkins. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations in or near the path include... Berryville... Huntsville... Eureka Springs... Green Forest... Beaver... Hindsville... Wesley... Carrollton... Rudd... Kingston... Forum... Aurora... Hobbs State Park... Clifty... Withrow Springs State Park... Marble... Osage... Urbanette... Rule... Grandview... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 AM CDT for northwestern Arkansas.
